packages.name: Human_hg19_genome
packages.title: Human hg19 genome
packages.description: Human genome hg19 indexed for BWA, Tophat, and HISAT. It includes all transcripts annotations (mRNAs and lncRNAs) from gencode v. 19 and v. 32 lifted to hg19. It also includes circRNAs and small non-coding RNAs annotations.

packages.name: Human_hg19_transcriptome
packages.title: Human hg19 transcriptome
packages.description: Human hg19 transcriptome indexed for Salmon (generated from mRNAs and lncRNAs annotations of gencode v. 19).

packages.name: Human_hg19_gencode_32lift_transcriptome
packages.title: Human hg19 gencode 32 transcriptome
packages.description: Human hg19 transcriptome indexed for Salmon (generated from mRNAs and lncRNAs annotations of gencode v. 32 lifted to hg19).

packages.name: Human_hg38_genome
packages.title: Human hg38 genome
packages.description: Human genome hg38 indexed for BWA, Tophat, and HISAT. It includes all transcripts annotations (mRNAs and lncRNAs) from gencode v. 32. It also includes circRNAs and small non-coding RNAs annotations lifted from hg19.

packages.name: Human_hg38_gencode_32_transcriptome
packages.title: Human hg38 gencode 32 transcriptome
packages.description: Human hg38 transcriptome indexed for Salmon (generated from mRNAs and lncRNAs annotations of gencode v. 32).
